title: On-boarding East Asia Today!
description: Despite a population of billions, East Asians are underrepresented in Catalyst due to a lack of localised content.
solution: Setup a translation pipeline that will translate catalyst documentation & proposals across as many languages in East Asia as possible.
experience: Co-Founders of Catalyst Swarm, Eastern Townhall, Catalyst School. IT & Software Engineering. educators and accountant in East Asia & Japan.
